title: nosorog_18
author: nosorog_18
content: The software is designed to automate the process of sending Gifts to buyers using the Digiseller marketplace. This solution is created to give you the opportunity to scale Main features of our software:​Order Processing Page: A convenient order receipt page allows the buyer to track the status of the order in real time, and in case of failures, the buyer can always request reshipment.​Full Automation: Our software provides complete automation of the process of sending Gifts. How it works? The buyer orders a game on Digiseller, and our soft bot takes care of all the rest of the work, adds the buyer as a friend on Steam and sends the purchased product.​Multilingual: Our software supports different languages, making it accessible to users around the world.​Bots for Lots of Orders: There is no limit to the number of bots you can use. We provide a powerful tool to process multiple orders.​Smart Balance Accounting: The system monitors bot balances, reserving funds for orders.​Load Balancing: The system evenly distributes the load between bots, taking into account their workload and the presence of balance.​High Performance: Our software is capable of processing thousands of transactions in a short time thanks to the system of internal transaction queues for each bot and the use of an unlimited number of proxies.​Control Panel: You have full control over the process thanks to the control panel, where you can track transactions and bot statuses in real time, with the ability to connect notifications in telegrams.​Screen of order processing page: https://i.imgur.com/V9mBwzI.pngPrice: 1200$Write in telegram: nosorog_18

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Is your service related to gambling? Can it be used by a casino? If the answer to my questions is “No” then I suggest you move your topic to; service board[1] or Goods[2], but majorly on service board only gambling real services should be posted here and if you should post non-related services you won’t get the response that you’re looking to receive.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=51.0

comments.author: Richbased

This solution is created to give you the opportunity to scale Main features of our software:​Order Processing Page: A convenient order receipt page allows the buyer to track the status of the order in real time, and in case of failures, the buyer can always request reshipment.​Full Automation: Our software provides complete automation of the process of sending Gifts. How it works? The buyer orders a game on Digiseller, and our soft bot takes care of all the rest of the work, adds the buyer as a friend on Steam and sends the purchased product.​Multilingual: Our software supports different languages, making it accessible to users around the world.​Bots for Lots of Orders: There is no limit to the number of bots you can use. We provide a powerful tool to process multiple orders.​Smart Balance Accounting: The system monitors bot balances, reserving funds for orders.​Load Balancing: The system evenly distributes the load between bots, taking into account their workload and the presence of balance.​High Performance: Our software is capable of processing thousands of transactions in a short time thanks to the system of internal transaction queues for each bot and the use of an unlimited number of proxies.​Control Panel: You have full control over the process thanks to the control panel, where you can track transactions and bot statuses in real time, with the ability to connect notifications in telegrams.​Screen of order processing page: https://i.imgur.com/V9mBwzI.pngPrice: 1200$Write in telegram: nosorog_18I believe this post isn't related in any way to gambling and I urge you to move this post to trading discussion, threads that are welcomed here are threads about gambling and gambling activities so some other time you read properly before making a thread on the forum.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: OP what cantsay has said is the truth and that is what you will be expected to do immediately so as to gain the expected audience you desire here otherwise nobody would attend to you. Another thing is for you to be a bit active here to because from the looks, you are a newbie and would cast doubt on your genuine intentions to  do a clean deal without problems. I would also advise that in other to gain the trust of members here, seek the service of an escrow here to guide you through so as to trust you want to deal otherwise nobody would come your way here as you are a newbie.
